name: World War V
description:
World War 4 has come and gone!

The globe is now in FLAMES and a new threat looms over the remaining lands!

YOU the player, a MASTER in the art of WAR, must take up arms in the new JJB-0507 "RYSIK" LASER TANK!

Fight against adversaries in this renewed global conflict: WORLD WAR V!

A Note from the Creator

This small game was created as part of a greater school project outlining some of the key elements of Linear Algebra found within video games.

As someone who was not very well versed with the technical side of game creation, this tiny en-devour was quite the intimidating ordeal to look forward to, and I suppose I only made it worse for myself when I decided to stay true to the vectory nature of the game aesthetically (It's a long story).

There were a couple of headaches here and there: rotation, enemy AI, movement; but in the end I was able to knock out the key elements before the end of the semester due date. I have to give a special thanks to my younger brother, who IS way more well versed with making games than I am. Without his help, I probably would've spent most of my time coding menus (the extent of my knowledge at the beginning).

I've come to learn a ton with this project, way more than I had anticipated, and I can't wait to see what more I can learn with it. Perhaps an updated future release?

Anyways, I hope you enjoy, and I look forward to continuing to make games for all!

-"Boho"
